flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday he made 32/2=<<32/2=16>>16 cookies
On Wednesday he made 16*3=<<16*3=48>>48 cookies
Before his brother ate some he had 32+16+48=<<32+16+48=96>>96 cookies
After his brother ate some he had 96-4=<<96-4=29>>29 cookies.
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 92, not 29. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
